artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige II; Publisher: Fujiokaya Keijirō; Carver: Katada Chōjirō
description: landscape view; figures in foreground; bridge in foreground center; buildings in LRC and at left; trees in middle ground and background; from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
markings: combined date and censor seal: 戌三改 {inu san aratame} (Dog 3 inspected); Carver\'s seal: ホリ長
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Views of Famous Places in Edo (Edo meishō zue 江戸名勝圖會)
title: Nishi Arai
